path.style: fill: none;
fill: none;

g.style: box-sizing: content-box; position: absolute; left: 0px; shape-rendering: geometricprecision; pointer-events: none;

path.style: stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(150, 150, 150); fill-opacity: 0.45; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(150, 150, 150); fill-opacity: 0.45; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0; stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(180, 188, 196); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 11px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; text-shadow: rgb(255, 255, 255) 1px 1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) -1px -1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1px -1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) -1px 1px 1px; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke-width: 0; stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(31, 119, 180); fill-opacity: 1;

rect.style: stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 0; stroke-width: 0px;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 9px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

path.style: opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgb(76, 120, 168); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: font-family: 'Open Sans', verdana, arial, sans-serif; font-size: 9px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

path.style: opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgb(138, 138, 138); fill-opacity: 1;

path.style: opacity: 1; stroke-width: 0px; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 1;
